body.p: 2. HLM dashboard crashes when UI has failed cloudtemplate. Workaround is to delete the failed cloud template from HLM CLI and re-login to the dashboard.
3. When Pipelines or Retention period settings are changed through Horizon, it takes a long time to apply the settings and will crash eventually. Try to re-login to get to Horizon dashboard.
4. Newly created tenants not getting listed in the dropdown menu from Horizon. Workaround is to logout of HOS horizon and log back.
5. Network address field shows default values when we edit the cloud from UI. But wr.json file shows the right updated entries.
